channel.title: I cannot change my ingame name to what i want it to be
channel.description:
What happened:
I tried changing my ingame name to "iyfBrainBug" which is the nickname i always use. It says "Choose a different name"
What was SUPPOSED to happen:
It was supposed to change my nickname to "iyfBrainBug"
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. My Account 2. Change name 3. Type "iyfBrainBug"
If the name interferes with some sort of curse-filter i would really love it if you could change it manually <3

item.title: I cannot change my ingame name to what i want it to be
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
maybe someone else already has that name for whatever reason

Read full topic
item.source: I cannot change my ingame name to what i want it to be
